Windlord:

"And convince her to help us to recover Malice... Perhaps we have to 
promised her our protection for her help, after help us Unicron 
would kill her..."said the male

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, robert riley <bustercross365@y...> 
wrote:
> Megatron Revived:
>  
> Megatron sat deep in thought, then looked up and took some sensor 
measurements.
> "First we must wait for the interferance to dissapate.  We can't 
do anything until then.  After that, we must secure a comm line to 
this Blacknightmare, see if we can talk for a while," he said, the 
wheels in his mind turning.
